title: The man in the moone, or, A discourse of a voyage thither by F.G., B. of H. ; to which is added Nuncius inanimatus, written in Latin by the same author, and now Englished by a person of worth.
author: Godwin, Francis, 1562-1633.
notes: Two versions of Nuncius inanimatus, Latin and English, included, each with special t.p. and separate pagination.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
